mapper.select: SELECT scon_no, scon_title, scon_priority, r FROM ( SELECT scon_no, scon_title, scon_contents, scon_views, scon_comment, scon_date,scon_priority,rownum as r FROM ( SELECT scon_no, scon_title, scon_contents, scon_views, scon_comment, scon_date,scon_priority FROM share_contents where scon_priority >0 ORDER BY scon_priority DESC ) ) WHERE r<=10
